text: @AusIndiMedia VERY! Mostly working fm home, takeaway meals only, no eating in restaurants or coffees in cafes, groceries once a week, no browing in stores, socialising = walks in sunshine....until at least end of winter #KeepTheLockdown #COVID19 @BelindaJones68
